title: Dollar’s Worst Week Since May Comes With US ‘Policy Nightmare’
description: The dollar notched its worst week since May, fueling gains in the yen and other global currencies after a week of unpredictable US policymaking that rattled financial markets.
content: The dollar notched its worst week since May, fueling gains in the yen and other global currencies after a week of unpredictable US policymaking that rattled financial markets.
